About me

I am a big ramen fan and I love to try out new bowls whenever I travel to a different country. You can check some of the best I had here, or follow the exceptional Ramenko's Blog to discover new ramen shops all around the world!.

My other interests are sport climbing & bouldering, philosophical existentialism, baking, and cats.
